title: Bound To Protect
description: An offer neither can refuse... Michael and Dante make Sabrina a pretend to be Michael's sole love interest for thirty days to dispel the rumors and stop the takeover. In exchange, they will pay her ten million dollars at month's end. But the lines soon become blurred as to what is real and what is make believe. And when their time together is up, will they be able to walk away, or will they take the chance to make their relationship the real deal?
author: Anya Summers
